explanations.machine learning: The paper explicitly mentions the use of machine learning, specifically Latent Dirichlet Allocation (LDA), a topic modeling technique, to categorize and identify technology areas within the underground logistics systems domain.
explanations.unsupervised learning: LDA is an unsupervised learning technique used for topic modeling, which is applied in the paper to categorize patent data without predefined labels.
explanations.clustering: LDA can be considered a form of clustering as it groups similar documents (patents in this case) into topics based on their content, which is a key part of the methodology described in the paper.
